moves.name: Moonblast
moves.description: Borrowing the power of the moon, the user attacks the target. This may also lower the target's Sp. Atk stat.

moves.name: Stored Power
moves.description: The user attacks the target with stored power. The more the user's stats are raised, the greater the damage.

moves.name: Misty Terrain
moves.description: The user covers the ground under everyone's feet with mist for five turns. This protects Pokémon on the ground from status conditions.

moves.name: Healing Wish
moves.description: The user faints. In return, the Pokémon taking its place will have its HP restored and status cured.

moves.name: Growl
moves.description: The user growls in an endearing way, making the opposing team less wary. The foes' Attack stats are lowered.

moves.name: Confusion
moves.description: The target is hit by a weak telekinetic force. It may also leave the target confused.

moves.name: Double Team
moves.description: By moving rapidly, the user makes illusory copies of itself to raise its evasiveness.

moves.name: Teleport
moves.description: Use it to flee from any wild Pokémon. It can also warp to the last Pokémon Center visited.

moves.name: Confusion
moves.description: The target is hit by a weak telekinetic force. It may also leave the target confused.

moves.name: Double Team
moves.description: By moving rapidly, the user makes illusory copies of itself to raise its evasiveness.

moves.name: Teleport
moves.description: Use it to flee from any wild Pokémon. It can also warp to the last Pokémon Center visited.

moves.name: Wish
moves.description: One turn after this move is used, the target's HP is restored by half the user's maximum HP.

moves.name: Magical Leaf
moves.description: The user scatters curious leaves that chase the target. This attack will not miss.

moves.name: Heal Pulse
moves.description: The user emits a healing pulse which restores the target's HP by up to half of its max HP.

moves.name: Calm Mind
moves.description: The user quietly focuses its mind and calms its spirit to raise its Sp. Atk and Sp. Def stats.

moves.name: Psychic
moves.description: The target is hit by a strong telekinetic force. It may also reduce the target's Sp. Def stat.

moves.name: Imprison
moves.description: If the opponents know any move also known by the user, the opponents are prevented from using it.

moves.name: Future Sight
moves.description: Two turns after this move is used, a hunk of psychic energy attacks the target.

moves.name: Captivate
moves.description: If it is the opposite gender of the user, the target is charmed into harshly lowering its Sp. Atk stat.

moves.name: Hypnosis
moves.description: The user employs hypnotic suggestion to make the target fall into a deep sleep.

moves.name: Dream Eater
moves.description: The user eats the dreams of a sleeping target. It absorbs half the damage caused to heal the user's HP.

moves.name: Stored Power
moves.description: The user attacks the target with stored power. The more the user's stats are raised, the greater the damage.

moves.name: Moonblast
moves.description: Borrowing the power of the moon, the user attacks the target. This may also lower the target's Sp. Atk stat.
